cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to the unknown enum 'invalid' will cause security configuration failure and potential communication issues.

du.explanation_en: Setting the physical log level to the unknown enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and potential system instability.
du.explanation_zh: 將物理日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致日誌配置失敗，並可能造成系統不穩定。
